page.title: 14STH WINGFIELD EMPLOYMENT(2)
page.content: { {Mr.and Mrs. Lesley Bates own and run a {thriving upholstery business in the {village of South Wingfield.} Eight years ago they rented a disused coach-house to start their business. They have re-upholstered many types of furniture for local people including three-piece suites and bar seats for public houses. Mr.Bates enjoys restoring antique furniture. Some of their more unusual jobs have included an order from the village undertaker to make a cover for a coffin and one from a local farmer to re-upholster the inside of a gig so that it could be used for transporting brides and grooms at local weddings.
